title: Disgraced financier Epstein found dead in cell
text: Jeffrey Epstein is found dead while awaiting trial on sex trafficking and conspiracy charges.

title: Disgraced financier Epstein found dead in cell
text: Jeffrey Epstein is found dead while awaiting trial on sex trafficking and conspiracy charges.

title: One million evacuated as deadly typhoon hits China
text: Twenty-two are killed and more are missing as powerful Typhoon Lekima hits the south-east coast.

title: Dozens dead in Tanzania fuel tanker blast
text: At least 60 people died, many of them trying to recover fuel from the overturned vehicle, police say.

title: Walmart panic caused by gun rights 'test'
text: The heavily armed man wanted to test his gun rights, despite his wife warning him it was a bad idea.

title: North Korea tests 'short-range ballistic missiles'
text: What appear to be two short-range ballistic missiles were fired early on Saturday, says South Korea.

title: Video 1 minute 10 secondsTear gas at Kashmir rally India denies happened
text: Thousands of people took to the streets in Srinagar – in a protest the Indian government denies happened.

title: 'Lessons to learn' from UK blackout
text: The company involved says the power cut affecting nearly 1m people was an "incredibly rare event".

title: Death toll rises to 95 in India monsoon floods
text: Hundreds of thousands of people are evacuated amid flooding in southern and western India, reports say.

title: Tens of thousands attend huge Moscow protest
text: Opposition groups have taken part in a demonstration in Moscow to demand fair local elections.

title: Second explosion hits Danish capital in a week
text: The explosion, which damaged a police station, follows another blast earlier this week.

title: 'Poop every other day' to save planet - Bolsonaro
text: Brazil's president was replying to a journalist's question about agriculture and deforestation.

title: Second explosion hits Danish capital in a week
text: The explosion, which damaged a police station, follows another blast earlier this week.

title: 'Poop every other day' to save planet - Bolsonaro
text: Brazil's president was replying to a journalist's question about agriculture and deforestation.

title: Video 3 minutes 42 seconds'We moved to the forest to fight climate change'
text: Janne Utriainen is tackling climate change in his own way - leaving the city to live off the land.

title: Williams wins rematch but Osaka still number one
text: Naomi Osaka will return to the top of the world rankings despite losing to Serena Williams after Karolina Pliskova is beaten in the quarter-finals of the Rogers Cup.

title: Man pushes birthday present BMW into river
text: The Indian man was reportedly upset at getting a BMW rather than a Jaguar for his birthday.
